topic: Anyone know if I can proactively prevent this?
subject: RE: [patchmanagement] Anyone know if I can proactively prevent this?
email_text_original:
Have not seen a solution to prevent its staged rollout that deploys the
auto-hide ‘Show Desktop’ feature…the only info found so far, is the option to
toggle it back on via Taskbar settings under Taskbar Behavior. 
Fyi – installing the Feb updates for 23H2 and 22H2 on Win11 Pro, the updates did
not deploy the rt side tray CoPilot icon or autohide the Show Desktop
feature(i.e. the staged-rollout not yet deployed on these two devices). 
…w 
From: 'Susan Bradley' via PatchManagement <patchmanagement@googlegroups.com>
Sent: February 13, 2024 12:06 PM
To: patchmanagement@googlegroups.com
Subject: Re: [patchmanagement] Anyone know if I can proactively prevent this? 
That's controlling copilot on 23H2, I want to ensure my 'show desktop' button
doesn't get auto hidden on my 22H2's.
